name: Roy Riesling
description:
Let me introduce you to the 2nd piece of my GANisseur Series limited to 10 artpieces made with VQGAN+CLIP. As all of my upcoming projects my artworks always have some relationship with wine or food (I am a Sommelier and Foodie by heart. 

In this case I thought about one of my favourite artists Roy Lichtenstein and one of my favourite grape varietals. As an result of that thought so called Roy Riesling was born. You can enjoy the artwork with a fresh, crisp Riesling. 

Cheers! And thank you for collecting my work!

Richard Nadler 2021 - GANisseur Series part 2 - 11.08.2021
